title: For It Before They Were Against It: Democrats Move The Goal Posts Again on an FBI Supplemental Background Investigation – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
October 4, 2018
This is now the 7th time the FBI has investigated Judge Kavanaugh. If we made it 100, it would still not be good enough for the Obstructionist Democrats.
						President Donald J. Trump					ANSWERING REPEATED CALLS FOR A SUPPLEMENTAL FBI INVESTIGATION: Senate Democrats repeatedly said a supplemental FBI investigation was the only way to get to the truth.MEETING THE DEMOCRATS’ OWN TIMELINE: In their calls for a supplemental FBI investigation, Senate Democrats touted that it could be completed in a week or less.  MOVING THE GOAL POSTS: Now that Senate Democrats have gotten exactly what they called for, they are moving the goal posts once again.
